v.v: We desire that Yahweh may help you when you call out to him when you have troubles!
We desire that he may reach out from his sacred temple and help you
We desire that he may accept all the offerings that you give him to be burned on the altar
We desire that he may give to you what you desire in your heart,
When you defeat your enemies, we will shout joyfully.
I know now that Yahweh rescues me, the one whom he has chosen to be king.
Some kings trust that because they have chariots they will be able to defeat their enemies,
Some will stumble and fall down,
Yahweh, help the king defeat our enemies!

v: We desire that God, whom our ancestor Jacob honored, may keep you safe from your enemies.
and aid you from where he lives on Mount Zion.
and that you may be able to accomplish all that you desire to do.
We will lift up a banner proclaiming that it is God who has helped you.
May Yahweh do for you all that you request him to do.
From his holy place in heaven he will answer me,
and he will save me by his great power.
and some trust that their horses will enable them to defeat their enemies,
but we will trust in the power of Yahweh our God.
but we will be strong and not be moved.
Answer us when we call out to you to help us!
